General.Name: Zhejiang He Chuan Technology Corp. Ltd. A
General.Description: Zhejiang Hechuan Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, sale, and application integration of industrial automation products. The company offers controllers, servo systems, vision systems, encoders, inverters, touch screens, linear modules, and other products. Its products are used in robots, photovoltaic electronics, 3C electronics, lithium-ion batteries, printing and packaging equipment, logistics and textile industry equipment, and CNC machine tools. Zhejiang Hechuan Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Quzhou, China.
